description: This application allows the game Marco Polo to be played with Alexa.   It used call and response as audio clues to locate your Alexa device.  When you find or tag Alexa you win.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Marco Polo, start game
name: Marco Polo
shortDescription: Play Marco Polo.  Keep your eyes closed and your ears open.  If you tag Alexa you win!
